mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL( count( 1 ), 0 ) AS `count` FROM items_comments WHERE item_id = #{itemId} GROUP BY comment_level = 1, comment_level = 2, comment_level = 3

SELECT u.nickname, u.face AS `userFace`, c.created_time AS createdTime, c.content, c.sepc_name AS specName FROM users u LEFT JOIN items_comments c ON c.user_id = u.id WHERE c.item_id = #{paramMap.itemId}
AND c.comment_level = #{paramMap.level}

SELECT i.id AS itemId, i.item_name AS itemName, sp.price AS price, ii.url AS imgUrl, i.sell_counts AS sellCounts FROM items i LEFT JOIN ( SELECT item_id, MIN( price_discount ) AS price FROM items_spec GROUP BY item_id ) sp ON i.id = sp.item_id LEFT JOIN items_img ii ON i.id = ii.item_id WHERE ii.is_main = 1 AND i.item_name LIKE '%${paramsMap.keywords}%'
ORDER BY
i.sell_counts
sp.price
i.item_name
DESC

SELECT i.id AS itemId, i.item_name AS itemName, sp.price AS price, ii.url AS imgUrl, i.sell_counts AS sellCounts FROM items i LEFT JOIN ( SELECT item_id, MIN( price_discount ) AS price FROM items_spec GROUP BY item_id ) sp ON i.id = sp.item_id LEFT JOIN items_img ii ON i.id = ii.item_id WHERE ii.is_main = 1 AND i.cat_id = #{paramsMap.catId}
ORDER BY
i.sell_counts
sp.price
i.item_name
DESC

SELECT i.id AS itemId, img.url AS itemImgUrl, i.item_name AS itemName, s.price_discount AS priceDiscount, s.price_normal AS priceNormal, s.id AS specId, s.`name` AS specName FROM items i LEFT JOIN items_spec s ON i.id = s.item_id LEFT JOIN items_img img ON img.item_id = i.id WHERE img.is_main = 1 AND s.id IN
#{specId}
